name: Enharmonic
description:
BETA VERSION (First 3 chapters)

Asami Summers and Yuuki Yamasaki made a promise after bidding farewell that one day they would reunite. 9 years have passed and both have been chasing down their dreams in LA, California at college for their careers as an artist and musician. Is there any hope to rebuild their previous connection as well as prepare them for their individual futures?

Team:

Art + Concept + Scriptwriting: @monicasivart

Programming + UI:  keycard

Narrative Text: @takson1744

Story Development: @nathankimy 

Please consider backing the project on Ko-fi to support the team!

What to expect in the full version:

  • 13 chapters of the main story
  • More story routes
  • Character sprites with more expressions and poses
  • Better backgrounds
  • More cutscene illustrations

Follow @monicasivart on Instagram for updates on the full version of the game.

Want more info about the characters? Check out this Instagram Guide!

Thank you for playing the BETA version of Enharmonic!

Stay tuned to find out more about Yuuki and Asami’s story.

 

Please give us feedback to improve the game!

Music:

Keshi - 2 soon (instrumental) by mellchm

JPom - Expectations

Kitsu - close your eyes

Singto Conley - Iced Coffee

SE:
